glsa.title: Cacti: SQL injection
glsa.synopsis: An SQL injection vulnerability has been discovered in Cacti.

background.p: Cacti is a complete web-based frontend to rrdtool.

description.p: It has been reported that the "local_graph_id" variable used in the file graph.php is not properly sanitized before being processed in an SQL statement.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request to the vulnerable host, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary SQL code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Cacti users should upgrade to the latest version:
